name.baseName: Livestock and poultry breeding ; transportation stage ; live pig retail
畜禽养殖 ; 运输阶段 ; 生猪散户

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The transportation stage mainly considers the transportation of feed, and the transportation mode is mainly road transportation. The damage caused to the surrounding environment of the road during the transportation process, the feed loss generated during the transportation process and other service costs (such as: high-speed fees, refueling fees, repair costs, etc.) are not considered, and only the exhaust emission during the vehicle transportation process is considered.
运输阶段主要考虑饲料的运输，运输方式主要为公路运输，在运输过程中对 公路周边环境所产生的破坏、运输过程中产生饲料损耗以及产生的其他服务费用 （例：高速费、加油费、修理费等）不予考虑，只考虑车辆运输过程中的尾气排 放。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This study was conducted from 2014 to 2015, aiming at livestock and poultry feeding cycle, meat ratio, feed formula, feed consumption, coal and electricity consumption, etc. Has been to Shandong Gaomi Zhengda pig farm, Laixi City Zhishuang dairy farm, Jimo city Duan Bolan town Jiangjiapo village pig farm, Jimo City Liujiazhuang town livestock farm, Rizhao City Changling town Guanzhuang village, Juxian County Zhailihe town Dongxing Agriculture and animal husbandry company, Juxian Qiaoshan town east Chen dairy farm, Juxian Qiaoshan town Liu Jiayi water pig farm, Zhucheng Foreign Trade Co., LTD. Phoenix parents breeding duck farm, Xinjiang Fukang Hongfa Breeding professional cooperative, Jiuyun Street Town Xuhong laying Chicken cooperative, Jiuyun Street Town Liuyun Village self-contained breeding farm, China Australia Holding Group Co., LTD., Dezhou City Qingyun County Wayu Village, Shandong Province Qingyun County four Liu community beef cattle breeding base, Dezhou City Qingyun Qingnian chicken breeding base, Qingyun County Yongli Poultry layer breeding company, Qingyun County Xingchen youth chicken breeding Field research was carried out by professional breeding cooperatives, Qingyun Dongtai broiler breeding cooperatives, Hebei Yanshan Boyuan Feed Co., LTD., Yanshan Da Chinese Feed Co., LTD., Wudi Liuhe Feed Co., LTD., and China-Australia Oriental Hope Feed Co., LTD.

本研究于 2014~2015 年，针对畜禽饲养周期、肉料比、饲料配方、饲料消耗 量、煤和电的消耗量等，先后对山东省高密正大种猪场、莱西市知双奶牛场、即 墨市段泊岚镇姜家坡村养猪场、即墨市刘家庄镇畜禽养殖场、日照市莒县长岭镇 上官庄村、莒县寨里河镇东兴农牧公司、莒县峤山镇东辰奶牛场、莒县峤山镇刘 家义水养猪场、诸城市外贸有限责任公司凤凰父母代种鸭场，新疆阜康宏发养殖 专业合作社、九运街镇旭鸿蛋鸡合作社、九运街镇六运村自成养殖场、中澳控股 集团有限公司、德州市庆云县洼于村、山东省庆云县四柳社区肉牛养殖基地、德 州市庆云青年鸡养殖基地、庆云县永利禽业蛋鸡育成公司、庆云县兴晨青年鸡养 殖专业合作社、庆云县东泰肉鸡养殖专业合作社、河北省盐山县博远饲料有限公 司、盐山县大华人饲料有限公司、无棣县六和饲料有限公司、中澳东方希望饲料 公司等地进行了实地调研。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: In this paper, the life cycle of livestock and poultry farming is divided into six stages: feed crop planting, feed processing, livestock and poultry raising, manure treatment, slaughter and transportation. The specific life cycle process of livestock and poultry breeding is shown in Figure 2-1. Due to the lack of some data and the limitations of basic conditions, the production, transportation and use of pesticides, mulch and feed additives have not been analyzed, and the environmental impact caused by other related infrastructure construction, transport production and labor costs is no longer considered.
本文将畜禽养殖生命周期 分为饲料作物种植、饲料加工、畜禽饲养、粪便处理、屠宰、运输等 6 个阶段。 畜禽养殖的生命周期具体流程如图 2-1 所示。由于部分数据的缺乏和基础条件的 限制，未对农药、地膜、饲料添加剂等生产、运输、使用进行分析，其他相关的 基础设施建设、运输工具生产、人力成本所引起的环境影响也不再考虑的范畴内。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described pertains to livestock and poultry breeding and is focused on the transportation stage of live pigs for retail purposes. The primary use of this data set is to assess the environmental impact of transporting feed for these animals, exclusively considering the road transport mechanism and its associated tailpipe emissions. Therefore, this data set may be used for environmental impact assessments in the agricultural sector, specifically regarding the transportation impacts on air quality due to exhaust emissions from vehicles used in the transport of livestock feed.
本工艺过程涉及畜禽养殖，并专注于生猪零售的运输阶段。该数据集的主要用途是评估运输这些动物的饲料的环境影响，仅考虑道路运输机制及其相关的尾气排放。因此，该数据集可用于农业领域中的环境影响评估，特别是关于由于用于运输畜禽饲料的车辆的尾气排放对空气质量的运输影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 周景月. 基于生命周期评价的畜禽养殖环境影响分析. (青岛科技大学, 2017).
周景月. 基于生命周期评价的畜禽养殖环境影响分析. (青岛科技大学, 2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment (LCA) of the transportation stage in live pig retail operations, researchers should note the following: 1. Only the exhaust emissions associated with road transportation of livestock feed are considered; other factors such as feed loss, road damage, and service costs are not included. 2. The data set pertains to the specific field research conducted between 2014 and 2015 and may not be reflective of other time periods or locations. 3. Proper allocation of impacts in multi-output processes should be ensured when using this data. 4. Assumptions made within the data set concerning energy consumption should be thoroughly reviewed and aligned with the specific circumstances of the assessment.

在使用该数据集对生猪零售运营的运输阶段进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，研究人员应注意以下几点：1. 只考虑与畜禽饲料道路运输相关的尾气排放；其他因素如饲料损耗、道路损坏和服务成本不包括在内。2. 数据集涉及的是2014年至2015年间的具体实地调研，可能并不反映其他时间段或地点的情况。3. 使用这些数据时，应确保在多输出过程中正确分配影响。4. 数据集中关于能源消耗的假设应彻底审查，并与评估的具体情况保持一致。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 假设运输过程中没有饲料的损耗
生产 1 功能单位畜禽产品，所对应的运输阶段产生污染物排放量,通过污染物排放量和排放系数求得。
